meanings: [명사] memory, recollection, (formal) remembrance, [동사] remember, (생각해 내다) recall, recollect, (마음에 담아 두다) bear[keep] (sth) in mind
remain[be, live, be retained] in one's memory

examples.korean: Memory can atrophy through lack of use. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 기억력은 쓰지 않으면 퇴화될 수 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: The memory of that day still haunts me. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그날의 기억이 아직도 내 뇌리에 계속 떠오른다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The memory of that day still haunts me. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She remembered the pleasantness of the evening. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 그날 저녁의 그 즐거움을 기억했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She remembered the pleasantness of the evening. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I have vivid memories of my grandparents. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 우리 할아버지, 할머니에 대한 기억들이 생생하다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I have vivid memories of my grandparents. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: That day is stamped indelibly on my memory. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그날은 내 기억 속에 지울 수 없는 각인으로 남아 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
